articles.description: Who has moved up or down since the draft or the deadline? We rerank baseball's best prospects -- with a new face at No. 1.
articles.content: We're in the midst of a changing of the guard at the top of minor league prospect lists. Adley Rutschmann, Bobby Witt Jr. and Julio Rodriguez had ruled these lists for months, and when they graduated… [+27753 chars]
